title: Ranbir Kapoor, Kareena Kapoor’s cousin Aadar Jain marries Alekha Advani at a white wedding in Goa; Karisma Kapoor, Neetu Kapoor share pics - The Indian Express
summary:
Aadar Jain, Kareena Kapoor’s cousin, marries Alekha Advani at a white wedding in Goa

Date: January 13, 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

Aadar Jain and Alekha Advani exchanged wedding vows in a picturesque ceremony in Goa, attended by notable family members of the Kapoor clan, including Karisma Kapoor and Neetu Kapoor.

  • The couple shared personal moments on Instagram, showcasing their wedding day.
  • Alekha wore a white dress with a veil, while Aadar donned a grey suit.
  • Members of the Kapoor family posted group photos from the celebrations.
  • The couple received heartfelt messages and videos from friends and relatives.
“Best friends to soulmates.” - Anissa Malhotra, sharing a special moment from the wedding.

The wedding marked a joyous occasion for the Kapoor family, celebrating love and togetherness.
newTitle: Aadar Jain and Alekha Advani's White Wedding in Goa: A Family Celebration

title: Madha Gaja Raja Box Office Collection Day 2 - Sacnilk
Madha Gaja Raja Box Office Day 1: Vishal’s Film Makes 244% Higher Opening Than Vanangaan! - Koimoi
summary:
Madha Gaja Raja Box Office Day 1: Vishal’s Film Makes 244% Higher Opening Than Vanangaan!

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 Source: Koimoi

Tamil actor Vishal Krishna Reddy returns with his long-awaited sci-fi action comedy, Madha Gaja Raja, which finally released on January 12, 2025, during the Pongal holidays. The film, shot in 2012, faced significant delays but has now made a strong box office debut.

  • The film earned 3.10 crores on its opening day, achieving impressive numbers despite mixed reviews from critics.
  • It opened with 244% higher earnings compared to the recent release, Vanangaan, which only made 0.90 crores.
  • Last year's Pongal featured major releases like Captain Miller and Ayalaan, earning 8.50 crores and 4 crores respectively.
  • Madha Gaja Raja also stars Anjali, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar, and Sonu Sood among others.
“The film has finally arrived in theatres after a decade of struggles.”

As it stands, while Madha Gaja Raja is not far behind Ayalaan's earnings, it still trails significantly behind Captain Miller's success. There are hopes that positive word-of-mouth will enhance its performance during the festive period.
newTitle: Madha Gaja Raja Box Office Day 1: Vishal’s Film Makes 244% Higher Opening Than Vanangaan!

summary:
Viral BTS Video of Varun Dhawan and Nargis Fakhri Captures Hilarious On-set Moment

Publication Date: Recent | Source: Times of India

A behind-the-scenes video featuring Bollywood stars Varun Dhawan and Nargis Fakhri has gone viral, showing a comedic moment during the filming of the 2014 movie 'Main Tera Hero'.

  • The clip features Varun Dhawan continuing an intimate scene after the director calls "Cut... Cut... Cut!".
  • The situation results in laughter from Nargis and the crew, showcasing their on-set chemistry.
  • The video has garnered over 100K views and has sparked discussions about actors' boundaries during filming.
  • Nargis Fakhri described Varun as her 'favourite co-star' and praised his energy and humor.
  • Varun Dhawan's recent works include the film 'Baby John' and the web series 'Citadel: Honey Bunny.'
Nargis Fakhri: "I think I had the most fun with Varun Dhawan on set. He's just really full of energy and positivity and he's funny, so it's contagious."

The video has stirred a mix of reactions from fans, highlighting both criticism and admiration for the actors' playful interactions.

title: Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collections: Second biggest opening for a NBK film - PINKVILLA
summary:
Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collections: Second biggest opening for a NBK film

Updated on Jan 13, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Daaku Maharaaj recorded the second-biggest opening for an NBK starrer at the Indian box office, amassing approximately Rs. 26 crore. Despite an unconventional Sunday release, the film performed strongly, particularly in Andhra Pradesh.

  • The film grossed Rs. 23 crore in the Telugu states.
  • Had potential to surpass Rs. 30.25 crore if released solo.
  • Strong reception from audiences during the Sankranti period.
  • The film has good prospects ahead due to the rejection of competitors.
  • Opened well overseas with nearly USD 1 million on opening day in the United States.

The First Day Box Office Collections of Daaku Maharaaj are as follows:

Area Gross
AP/TS Rs. 23.00 cr.
Nizam Rs. 6.50 cr.
Ceded Rs. 5.25 cr.
Andhra Rs. 11.25 cr.
Karnataka Rs. 2.50 cr.
Tamil Nadu Rs. 0.25 cr.
Rest of India Rs. 0.25 cr.
INDIA Rs. 26.00 cr.
“The initial reception seems to be decent enough.”

In conclusion, Daaku Maharaaj's impressive opening indicates strong audience interest and highlights its potential for further financial success during the lucrative Sankranti period.
newTitle: Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collections: Second biggest opening for a NBK film

title: Ben Affleck emotionally hugs and kisses daughter Violet's forehead after fleeing Palisades fire - Hindustan Times
summary:
As wildfires threaten Hollywood, Ben Affleck shares a touching embrace with his daughter, Violet, after a harrowing evacuation from his LA mansion.

Date: Jan 13, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Amid the terrifying backdrop of the Palisades Fire, actor Ben Affleck was photographed sharing a tender moment with his eldest daughter, Violet. After a hasty evacuation, Affleck was seen embracing his daughter in a warm, emotional hug, expressing relief as he returned to find his property unharmed.

  • Ben Affleck and daughter Violet had an emotional reunion after escaping the wildfires threatening their home.
  • The Palisades Fire has already claimed 16 lives and forced mass evacuations of several celebrity homes.
  • Affleck's property was spared from the devastation, and he expressed gratitude for his family's safety.
  • He has maintained regular contact with ex-wife Jennifer Lopez during the crisis.
  • Violet is preparing to return to Yale University for the spring semester.
“Ben’s home is still under evacuation order, but he feels so grateful his property is safe for the time being,” a source said.

The touching moment between Affleck and Violet highlights the personal toll of the wildfires, reminding us of the importance of family amidst crisis.
newTitle: Ben Affleck Shares Emotional Moment with Daughter Amidst California Wildfires

title: Fateh box office collection day 3: Sonu Sood, Jacqueline Fernandez film earns just over ₹6 crore so far - Hindustan Times
summary:
Fateh Box Office Collection Day 3: The Film Struggles to Gain Momentum in India

Date: Jan 13, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Indian box office collection for Sonu Sood's directorial debut, Fateh, remains low after three days. The film garnered just over ₹6 crore in total earnings as it faces competition from other significant releases.

  • Day 1 earnings: ₹2.4 crore
  • Day 2 earnings: ₹2.1 crore
  • Day 3 earnings (early estimates): ₹2.1 crore
“Whenever a Bollywood movie is made, we often say that why our movies do not have action scenes like foreign movies,” said Sonu Sood.

The film is inspired by real-life incidents of cybercrime during the Covid-19 pandemic and features prominent actors like Jacqueline Fernandez and Naseeruddin Shah.
newTitle: Fateh Box Office Collection: Day 3 Earnings Show Challenges for Sonu Sood's Film

This festive release is set to entertain audiences with its energetic music and engaging performances.

title: Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan and Shankar film scores a mere 125cr weekend worldwide - PINKVILLA
summary:
Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan and Shankar film scores a mere 125cr weekend worldwide

Publication Date: January 13, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

The film Game Changer has witnessed a dramatic decline in box office collections, grossing a total of Rs. 125 crore during its opening weekend worldwide.

  • The film's collections dropped significantly, adding only Rs. 17.50 crore on Sunday.
  • In India, the total collection stands at Rs. 99.75 crore.
  • Overseas, it grossed approximately USD 2.90 million.
  • In Telugu states, it earned only Rs. 6.50 crore on its worst Sunday in recent years.
  • The expected closing collection is between Rs. 75-80 crore in Telugu states.

The Box Office Collections of Game Changer:

Area Gross
AP/TS Rs. 60.50 cr.
Nizam Rs. 20.50 cr.
Ceded Rs. 11.25 cr.
Andhra Rs. 28.75 cr.
Karnataka Rs. 7.25 cr.
Tamil Nadu Rs. 5.50 cr.
Kerala Rs. 0.50 cr.
Rest of India Rs. 26.00 cr.
OVERSEAS USD 2,930,000 (Rs. 25.00 cr.)
WORLDWIDE Rs. 124.75 cr.
It is essentially “game over” for Game Changer as collections have plummeted to alarmingly low levels.

In conclusion, despite expectations during the Sankranti holidays, the film is unlikely to recover and face significant financial losses.
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan and Shankar film scores a mere 125cr weekend worldwide

title: Game Changer Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 3: Ram Charan-Shankar film sees a massive 65 percent drop, inches towards the Rs 100 cr club - The Indian Express
summary:
Game Changer Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 3

Date & Source: January 13, 2025, Indian Express

Game Changer, starring Ram Charan and directed by Shankar, opened to significant anticipation but has seen a major decline in box office collections over its first weekend.

  • The film earned Rs 51 crore on its opening day but only Rs 21.6 crore on Day 2.
  • Day 3 saw a further drop to Rs 17 crore, bringing the total domestic nett collection to Rs 89.6 crore.
  • The dip is attributed to mixed reviews and competition from another film, Daaku Maharaaj.
  • Despite the slump, the global box office estimate for the opening weekend is projected to be between Rs 250-300 crore.
  • Hindi language collections have remained stable, unlike the Telugu version which has faced a stark decline.
“The biggest dips in the collections came from the Telugu version of the film.”

The future performance of Game Changer remains uncertain as it competes with new releases during the holiday season.
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Collection Sees Significant Drop on Day 3

title: Los Angeles wildfires: Former child actor Rory Sykes tragically dies in Malibu after water was switched off - The Indian Express
summary:
Tragic Death of Former Child Actor Rory Sykes Amid Malibu Wildfires

Date: January 13, 2025
Source: Indian Express

Rory Callum Sykes, a former child star known for the British TV show Kiddy Kapers, died at 32 during the devastating wildfires in Los Angeles.

  • Rory had cerebral palsy and was blind, making evacuation impossible.
  • His mother confirmed his death, stating he died from carbon monoxide poisoning.
  • Firefighters faced water shortages due to lack of municipal water supply.
  • The wildfires have resulted in at least 24 confirmed deaths so far.
  • The Palisades fire has destroyed over 22,000 acres and is only partially contained.
“It is with great sadness that I have to announce the death of my beautiful son @Rorysykes to the Malibu fires yesterday. I’m totally heart broken.” – Shelley Sykes

The tragic incident highlights the human cost of the wildfires and raises concerns over emergency response efficiency.
newTitle: Tragic Death of Former Child Actor Rory Sykes Amid Malibu Wildfires
